articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Introduction to R Programming
Resources
articles.contents:
Books
R Programming
R for Data Science - This is by far-and-away the best guide to the tidyverse. An absolute must have!
Hands on Programming with R - Good resource for base R
Data Visualization
ggplot2 - Great overview of ggplot2
Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction - Good resource for data visualization
R Markdown
R Markdown Cookbook - Great guide to R Markdown
General
Big Book of R - Repository of freely available R books. There’s a lot of them!
Websites
R Studio Education
R Bloggers
